document_data.caption: Map showing the Dessarin Road. Click to enlarge.
document_data.name: Dessarin Road
document_data.mainbody: '''Dessarin Road''' was a trail leading from [[Beliard]] though the badlands and plains to [[Bargewright Inn]]. It was approximately 64 miles (103 kilometers) between the two cities, following this road.{{Cite dragon+/1/Travel Talk: The Dessarin River Valley}}
document_data.Places of Interest:
* [[Beliard]]
* [[Bargewright Inn]]
* [[Halls of the Hunting Axe]]
* [[Ironford]]
* [[The Iron Road]]
* [[Jundar's Pass]]
